titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Office of Grant and Contract Administration, Yale University, Records Concerning Department of Energy Contracts
Office of Grant and Contract Administration, Yale University, Records Concerning Department of Energy Contracts
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday November 30, 2018 at 10:40

did.unittitle: Office of Grant and Contract Administration, Yale University, records concerning Department of Energy contracts

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of contracts, correspondence, proposals, and financial records documenting two Department of Energy contracts at Yale.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Office of Grant and Contract Administration

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 3-D (YRG 3-D), Records documenting academic support functions at Yale University.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Office of Grant and Contract Administration, Yale University, Records Concerning Department of Energy Contracts (RU 761). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by contract.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of contracts, correspondence, proposals, and financial records documenting two Department of Energy contracts at Yale.

controlaccess.subject: Research and development contracts, Government
